1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.1: Now the children of Israel according to their number, the heads of families, captains of thousands and of hundreds, and officers, that served the king according to their companies, who came in and went out every month in the year, under every chief were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.2: Over the first company the first month Jesboam, the son of Zabdiel was chief, and under him were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.3: Of the sons of Phares, the chief of all the captains in the host in the first month.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.4: The company of the second month was under Dudia, an Ahohite, and after him was another named Macelloth, who commanded a part of the army of four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.5: And the captain of the third company for the third month, was Banaias the son of Joiada the priest: and in his division were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.6: This is that Banaias the most valiant among the thirty, and above the thirty. And Amizabad his son commanded his company.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.7: The fourth, for the fourth month, was Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zabadias his son after him: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.8: The fifth captain for the fifth month, was Samaoth a Jezerite: and his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.9: The sixth, for the sixth month, was Hira the son of Acces a Thecuite: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.10: The seventh, for the seventh month, was Helles a Phallonite of the sons of Ephraim: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.11: The eighth, for the eighth month, was Sobochai a Husathite of the race of Zarahi: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.12: The ninth, for the ninth month, was Abiezer an Anathothite of the sons of Jemini, and in His company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.13: The tenth, for the tenth month, was Marai, who was a Netophathite of the race of Zarai: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.14: The eleventh, for the eleventh month, was Banaias, a Pharathonite of the sons of Ephraim: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.15: The twelfth, for the twelfth month, was Holdai a Netophathite, of the race of Gothoniel: and in his company were four and twenty thousand.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.16: Now the chiefs over the tribes of Israel were these: over the Rubenites, Eliezer the son of Zechri was ruler: over the Simeonites, Saphatias the son of Maacha:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.17: Over the Levites, Hasabias the son of Camuel: over the Aaronites, Sadoc:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.18: Over Juda, Eliu the brother of David: over Issachar, Amri the son of Michael:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.19: Over the Zabulonites, Jesmaias the son of Adias: over the Nephtalites, Jerimoth the son of Ozriel:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.20: Over the sons of Ephraim, Osee the: son of Ozaziu: over the half tribe of Manasses, Joel the son of Phadaia:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.21: And over the half tribe of Manasses: in Galaad, Jaddo the son of Zacharias: and over Benjamin, Jasiel the son of Abner.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.22: And over Dan, Ezrihel the son of Jeroham: these were the princes of the children of Israel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.23: But David would not number them from twenty years old and under: because the Lord had said that he would multiply Israel like the stars of heaven.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.24: Joab the son of Sarvia began to number, but he finished not: because upon this there fell wrath upon Israel: and therefore the number of them that were numbered, was not registered in the chronicles of king David.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.25: And over the king's treasures was Azmoth the son of Adiel: and over those stores which were in the cities, and is the villages, and in the castles, was Jonathan the son of Ozias.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.26: And over the tillage, and the husbandmen, who tilled the ground, was Ezri the son of Chelub:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.27: And over the dressers of the vineyards, was Semeias a Romathite: and over the wine cellars, Zabdias an Aphonite.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.28: And over the oliveyards and the fig groves, which were in the plains, was Balanam a Gederite: and over the oil cellars, Joas.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.29: And over the herds that fed in Saron, was Setrai a Saronite: and over the. oxen in the valleys, Saphat the son of Adli:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.30: And over the camels, Ubil an Ishmahelite: and over the asses, Jadias a Meronathite:
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.31: And over the sheep Jazia an Agarene. All these were the rulers of the substance of king David.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.32: And Jonathan David's uncle, a counsellor, a wise and learned man: he and Jahiel the son of Hachamoni were with the king's sons.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.33: And Achitophel was the king's counsellor, and Chusai the Arachite, the king's friend.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__27.34: And after Achitophel was Joiada the son of Banaias, and Abiathar. And the general of the king's army was Joab.
